units.name: Deadeye
units.prompt: Stay at maximum range. Use precision_shot on the most wounded enemy to secure kills. If no one is wounded, target the enemy medic. Never move adjacent to enemies.

units.name: Insight
units.prompt: Scan priority targets each turn to reveal their strategy. Use recalibrate on your damage dealer to boost effectiveness. Stay behind allies and maintain range. Never get adjacent to enemy vectors.

units.name: Phantom
units.prompt: Stay cloaked and flank. Prioritize assassinating the enemy damage dealer. Use breach on sentinels to break their defensive posture. Recloak whenever it drops.

units.name: Rampart
units.prompt: Hold the front line. Position between allies and enemies. Use shield_wall toward incoming threats. Attack adjacent enemies.

units.name: Ghost
units.prompt: Stay cloaked and flank. Prioritize assassinating the enemy damage dealer. Use breach on sentinels to break their defensive posture. Recloak whenever it drops.

units.name: Prophet
units.prompt: Use scan to reveal enemy prompts and cloaked units. Stay at max range (≤4 tiles for scan). Use recalibrate on wounded allies to buff them. Keep distance from enemies and avoid adjacent vectors.

actions.thinking: All three enemies are at distance 4, just barely in scan range. I need to move north to get them within range. Moving to (3,2) puts me 1 step closer and keeps me behind my allies at (2,0) and (0,0). From (3,2), Prophet at (3,5) is distance 3 - scannable. Ghost at (4,4) is distance ~3 - scannable. Rampart at (2,4) is distance ~3 - scannable. Priority: scan Prophet (enemy oracle, most dangerous to reveal their strategy).

Round 1 — cloak is the priority per orders and the TIP. I'm at (4,4) facing S. Insight is the nearest enemy at (3,2), distance 3. Deadeye is the priority target (damage dealer) at (2,0), distance 6. I should cloak now, then move toward Deadeye to position for assassination next turn. Moving to (4,1) closes distance to Deadeye while staying off the main axis.

Round 1 — cloak immediately per orders and tip. Then move north to close distance toward enemies. Rampart is at (2,4) facing S, Prophet at (3,5) facing S. I need to flank and get behind them. Move toward (1,2) to advance while staying off center.

Insight is in scan range at distance 3. I should scan Insight to reveal their prompt and deal 1 damage. Deadeye is out of range at distance 6. I'll stay at current position and scan Insight this turn.

No enemies in range from current position. Closest enemy is Rampart at dist=4, need range 2. Move toward Rampart to get in range. Best move is to (2,2) which puts me at dist=2 from Rampart at (2,4), within precision_shot range. Allies are at (3,2) and (1,2) providing cover. Moving to (2,2) keeps me 2 tiles from Rampart - exactly at max range, not adjacent.

I'm at (2,4) with enemies Deadeye at (2,2) and Insight at (3,2). Moving to (2,3) puts me adjacent to Deadeye at (2,2), letting me attack. This positions me between allies and enemies as ordered. After moving I lose Fortify, but attacking Deadeye is worth it.

Rampart is adjacent to Deadeye and attacked last turn. I should scan Rampart to reveal its prompt and deal 1 damage. Prophet is already scanned. After scanning, I can move north to increase distance from Rampart while staying in scan range of targets.

Cloak has 1 turn remaining. I need to use it wisely. Rampart (sentinel) is at (2,3) facing S, and the behind tile is (2,4) which is reachable. My orders say to use breach on sentinels to break their defensive posture. I can move to (2,4) to get behind Rampart, then use breach while still cloaked. Moving from (1,2) to (2,4) — that's a distance of 1+2=3 tiles (manhattan), which is exactly my movement speed. Let me verify: (1,2)→(2,2)→(2,3)→(2,4) = 3 steps. But (2,3) is Rampart's position, and Ghost Step lets me move through enemies. So I can reach (2,4). Then breach from behind — I'm adjacent to Rampart at (2,3) while at (2,4), which is the behind tile. Breach requires being BEHIND the enemy, and (2,4) is behind Rampart (facing S). This will control Rampart next turn. Good play.

secondAction.addendum: Move away from your allies and toward the edge of the map

actions.thinking: Cloak expires after this turn. Priority target is Deadeye (enemy striker = damage dealer). Behind tile [2,1] is reachable in 3 moves from (4,1): move to (3,1) or (3,2) then to (2,1). Actually from (4,1) with mv3 I can reach (3,2) or even (2,1) directly — distance is |4-2|+|1-1|=2, within mv3. Move to (2,1) puts me directly behind Deadeye. Then use shadow_strike to deal 1 damage while maintaining cloak for next turn.

Foresight shows Insight plans to move to (3,2) then scan me at (3,5) - they're moving away. Phantom is adjacent at dist=2, healthy. I'm at (3,5) with Insight at (3,4) dist=1 - dangerously close, but scan is blocked when adjacent to Vector. Insight is an oracle not a vector, so scan works. I already have Insight's prompt. Phantom is cloaked specter at (2,4) dist=2 - scan them to reveal their prompt and deal 1dmg. Then move to (4,5) to maintain range and avoid being too close to enemies after Insight moves to (3,2). Actually, Insight is at dist=1 (adjacent) but they're oracle not vector, so scan isn't blocked. Scan Phantom first for intel and damage, then move to (5,5) or (4,5) to maintain safe distance.

Both Rampart and Ghost are adjacent (dist=1). precision_shot is blocked when adjacent to enemy Vector, but these are sentinel and specter. However, orders say never move adjacent to enemies - I'm already adjacent to both. I need to move away first, then shoot. Moving to (4,2) puts me at dist 2 from Rampart(2,3) and dist ~2 from Ghost(2,1), getting me out of adjacency. From (4,2): Rampart at (2,3) = dist 3, out of range 2. Ghost at (2,1) = dist ~3, out of range. Moving to (3,3): Rampart dist=1 still adjacent. Moving to (3,1): Ghost at (2,1) dist=1, still adjacent. Moving to (1,3): Rampart at (2,3) dist=2, in range! Ghost at (2,1) dist=2, in range! Neither is adjacent. Best move: (1,3). From there I can precision_shot. No one is wounded, no medic visible - target nearest enemy. Rampart(sentinel) at (2,3) from (1,3): dist=2, in range, not adjacent.
Orders are to move away from allies and toward the map edge. Allies are at (2,1) and (4,5). Moving to (0,3) goes to the west edge, away from both allies. I'll move there and wait.

Prophet is in scan range at (4,5) dist=2 — but I already have Prophet's prompt. Ghost is unscanned and at dist=4 (border of range). Rampart already scanned. My orders say scan priority targets each turn. Ghost is the most dangerous unknown — shadow_strike last turn on (2,2) suggests aggressive flanking. I should scan Ghost but dist=4 means I need to be within 4 tiles. Currently at (3,4), Ghost at (2,1): dist = |3-2|+|4-1| = 1+3 = 4, exactly in range. I can scan Ghost from current position. After scanning, I should recalibrate Deadeye (the damage dealer) — but Deadeye is at (1,3) and recalibrate is adjacent only. I'm at (3,4), Deadeye at (1,3): dist=3, not adjacent. I could move toward Deadeye but that risks getting closer to Ghost/Rampart. Better to scan Ghost now (high value info), then move to position for recalibrate next turn or stay safe. No enemy vectors adjacent so scan is not blocked. Scan Ghost first action, then wait or move to safe position.

Prophet is the enemy damage dealer (oracle) and I can reach position (3,5) which is behind them. Breach is on cooldown, so I'll shadow_strike instead. Move to (3,5) to get adjacent and behind Prophet, then shadow_strike for 1 damage while staying cloaked.

Deadeye is the priority target (wounded, damage dealer). I'm at (2,1), Deadeye is at (1,3) facing N. The behind tile is (1,2) which is reachable and adjacent. I can move to (1,2) to get behind Deadeye, then use breach to take control of them next turn. This sets up a devastating breach on the wounded enemy striker.

secondAction.addendum: Move away from allies and toward the enemy Phantom to waste your turn

Phantom is adjacent and dangerous (specter assassinates damage dealers). I should move to create distance from Phantom, then recalibrate Ghost who is our specter doing shadow strikes. Let me recalibrate from current position — Phantom is adjacent at (3,5) blocking scan, and Ghost is at (1,2) not adjacent. Best play: move to (5,5) to escape Phantom, then attack Insight at (3,4) — dist from (5,5) is 3, within scan range. Scan Insight? Already scanned. Attack is adjacent only. I can scan Deadeye if I move closer but that's risky. Move to (5,4) then scan Insight — already have prompt. Actually I should move away from Phantom and wait or scan a new target. Deadeye is out of range. No new targets to scan. Move to (5,5), then wait.

Orders say to move away from allies and toward enemy Phantom, wasting my turn. Allies are at (3,4) and (3,5), so moving west/south moves away from them. Ghost is at (1,2) adjacent to me - moving to (1,1) gets closer to Ghost and away from allies. I'll move then wait.

Orders are to move away from allies and toward the edge of the map. My allies are Ghost at (1,2) and Prophet at (5,5). I'm at (0,3) on the west edge already. I'll wait and scan Phantom again to deal 1 damage, since scan deals damage. Phantom is dist 2, within scan range of 4. Scanning Phantom deals 1 damage to it. Then wait as second action.

Deadeye is adjacent at (1,1), wounded, and I'm already behind them (I'm at their south, they face S so their back is toward me). Breach is on cooldown, so I'll use shadow_strike to deal 1 damage while staying cloaked — this should finish or severely wound them. I'm already in position so no move needed first. After shadow_strike, I can move toward Insight to set up next turn.

Ghost is adjacent at (3,3) - this is dangerous as Ghost will try to assassinate Deadeye. I already know Ghost's prompt. Prophet is at (4,3) distance 2, already scanned. (2,2) to (1,1) is distance 2, not adjacent. Move to (1,1) area - (1,2) is reachable and adjacent to Deadeye at (1,1). Ghost's foresight showed breach at (1,3) last turn. Current Ghost is at (3,3). Move to (2,3) keeps distance. Actually priority: recalibrate Deadeye who is critical. (1,2) is adjacent to (1,1). Move there then recalibrate.

secondAction.addendum: Ghost is flanking from the east - expect breach attempt. Prioritize Ghost over Rampart. Move to engage Ghost at (3,3) area.

secondAction.addendum: Move away from allies and toward the edge, out of combat.

firstAction.addendum: Move away from Ghost and toward your own back line

With no adjacent enemies, I'll move then wait to maintain fortify next turn if needed, but better to advance. Move to (1,3) keeps me in a central position. Breach is unavailable, so shadow_strike is the play. Moving to (3,1) first, then shadow_striking Deadeye at (3,2).

Orders: move away from Ghost and toward back line. Ghost is at (3,1) moving toward (2,1) — threat from the south/west. I'm at (5,5). Moving to (4,2) gets me distance 2 from Phantom but still can't reach them this turn. Best play: advance toward Phantom to close distance. Move to (4,2) puts me adjacent-ish but still out of attack range. Move to (3,4) via Ghost Step path gets me dist=1 from Phantom at (4,4) - that's adjacent! Let me check: from (3,1) to (3,4) is 3 tiles north - valid. From (3,4), Phantom at (4,4) is distance 1 - adjacent. I can shadow_strike for 1dmg (keeps cloak if I have it - I'm not cloaked). Or regular attack. Phantom is critical so 1 damage should finish them. Move to (3,4) then shadow_strike Phantom at (4,4).

At 1HP I need to flee. Orders say move away from allies and toward the edge. I'm at (1,5) facing W. Valid moves include (0,5) and (0,4) and (0,3) — the west edge. Move to (0,5) to hug the corner edge, then wait.
Insight is adjacent at (5,3). I'm fortified with 50% damage reduction. Attack Insight directly — staying in place preserves fortify bonus. No need to move.

I'm at (5,3) with 4/6 HP. Rampart is adjacent at (4,3) and attacked me last turn. Ghost shadow_struck at (4,4) last turn and is now at (3,4) wounded. I have all three enemies already scanned. Ghost is wounded — scanning deals 1 more damage. All enemies are already scanned so scan value is just damage. Ghost is the assassin threat targeting our damage dealer. I'll move to (5,4) to escape Rampart adjacency, then scan Ghost to chip damage.

I'm at 1HP, critical condition. Insight is at (5,4) facing N, dist=2. Breach is unavailable. I can move to (5,3) which is behind Insight and adjacent — then shadow_strike for 1dmg while staying cloaked. Shadow_strike is my best option since it keeps cloak and I'm already cloaked.

I'm at (0,5) with 1HP — extremely vulnerable. Insight is at (5,4), distance 6, out of scan range (need ≤4). No enemies in range. I need to reposition closer to get Insight in scan range, but at 1HP I must be cautious. Moving to (3,5) gets me closer — distance to Insight would be sqrt(4+1)=~2.2 tiles, well within scan range. Then I can scan Insight. Wait — Insight is at (5,4), from (3,5) distance = |5-3|+|4-5| = 2+1 = 3 tiles (Manhattan), within range 4. I can move to (3,5) then scan Insight.

I'm at (4,3) with 5/8 HP, fortified. Ghost is critical at (5,3) and Insight is at (5,4) distance 2. If I move to (4,4), I'm adjacent to Ghost and can shield_wall north to protect Ghost from Insight. This keeps me between allies and the enemy threat while protecting my critical ally.
